title: 8.4 Master Challenge 1
question:
Consider the following sentence:
Rick was suddenly thirsty and dry.
Write a Java program to print the count of the vowels in this sentence Sample output:

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
